Text: Uwo uwo muya dab apachi iño̩ tod eju Jihofa ki dʼane̩,
Anyo̩ ki mu abo du ku ma che ojibo ku ma gbe̩ le̩,
Todu uwe̩, Jihofa, chʼỌmachala atate̩ ñw ane̩ ile̩ du;
O ame̩ ku me̩ fe̩do̩ Jihofa le̩ me̩ nachʼulaka e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩;
Ma dʼugane̩ fia jo̩ ñw e̩no̩kpakpa,
Me̩ nayo̩ efu Jihofa, ame̩ abo̩kpakpa,
